name: UpdateErrorTrackingSymbols
description:
Update symbol sets for error tracking in a specific environment.

Use this tool to update symbol sets for error tracking within a specified project environment. It should be called when you need to modify existing symbol set data in the Datadog environment.

parameters.name: error_tracking_symbol_set_id
parameters.description: A UUID identifying the error tracking symbol set to update.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking symbol set.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project you wish to access. Retrieve by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking symbol set.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking symbol set.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
